classroom.colorOp

Class ColorManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • classroom.colorOp.ColorManager

  • public class ColorManager
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used for managing colors in an drawing application
    Author:
    Ben Kirtley This work complies with the James Madison University honor code
